forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: number of people on

comments.text: to see how many people there currently are in the universe, go to the areas dialog, and turn it around.
this number also shows at in.anyland.com for your browser (a page also suited to add as homepage icon on the phone).
to find out who's in the current area, go to the area dialog (mountain icon), turn it around, and click on the people icon.
to output the number of people in a text creation, use the placeholder [people count]

thread.latestCommentText: to output the number of people in a text creation, use the placeholder [people count]
